name: Zombieeeeeee
description:
NOTE: does not work in Safari. You will need Chrome or Firefox.

Just a little zombie survival game.

 First game project by 11 year old and her father.

Controls

ASDW or Arrows = Move

 Enter = Pick things up/eat (if in inventory)

Space = Open inventory

Z = sleep / wake up

M = Open minimap

1 = Open achievements

R = Restart (you keep your achievements and minimap)

Credits

Made with Godot.

The tilesets were made by awesome people for the Liberated Pixel Cup (https://lpc.opengameart.org/ ). Specifically we used this LPC tile atlas: https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-tile-atlas
